Our Services

Fit-Out Solution

Les Soeurs Fit Out’s core business activity is the fit out of residential, office, commercial, hotels, resorts, leisure, and mixed-use developments with a scope of works that can include all finishes (floor, wall, ceiling, joinery, partition, and many more). Relatively, all other services such as value engineering, procurement, site supervision and project management are in one contract.

Design Process

Property Management

We have a continuous and proven track record of successfully managed projects of all sizes. Essentially, we pride ourselves in being the top trusted company not only in interior designing but also in taking care of your property. We provide full and quality property management services in a budget-friendly condition.

We have superb properties for short-term and long-term lease in major cities in the Philippines. With a combination of complete amenities, world-class interior designs, friendly staff, perfect location for both staycation and business purposes, COMFORT is absolutely guaranteed. Book NOW!

Design Consultancy

We understand that perfection is in every detail. Which is why we are cautious in choosing our team. Our team has international exposure. That alone makes them exceptional. Architects and designers are not only responsible for providing incomparable designs but they make sure your home or office is built with the high-quality materials available in the market that best suits to your tastes and needs.

Procurement Services

Our home is a place where the most wonderful memories of our lives happen. With our procurement services, we make sure that all materials, furniture, and appliances installed in your house have the best quality while the cost is affordable. Save yourself from the unnecessary hassle, we will handle it for you. So, just sit tight and relax.

Move-In Assistance

We understand moving won’t give you a pleasant feeling. You have to deal with heavy traffic, unpredictable weather, and tiring installations of furniture and appliances. Please save your energy with your family. We have a dedicated team to help you.
